subject: Missed the Teaser?
event: Don't worry about it. Here you go, for everyone in Europe and Asia and Saturn's moons, and those who don't have HBO (yet, I hope), and those who just want to watch it thirty times (hey, I'm way ahead of you): Enjoy. And for lagniappe, check out HBO's brand new GAME OF THRONES web page: http://www.hbo.com/game-of-thrones

comments.article: Not bad.

OMG OMG OMG OMG

It's really happening...

Oh my God!!!
Thank you so much for posting this!!
I have HBO (haha), but I'm missed this... It look wonderful, I can't wait to see it!! *_*

Here is a link to the official HBO site (you can load up the fullscreen version under the Video section.

http://www.hbo.com/#/game-of-thrones
Eeeeeeee!!!
sweet!

comments.upictitle: Ai, aye, eye!: furry bowling pin
comments.article: *squees* \(^o^)/
watched it a dozen times, almost peed my pants. totally scared my dog when i started jumping around in circles, clapping and giggling.
That´s exactly my situation. Even the dog, Bran, looked at me thinking that i was mad.

When I saw online that the Game of Thrones teaser was going to air before True Blood tonight, I immediately called my cable company and subscribed to HBO for the first time ever. :)

Love that picture of Sean Bean as Ned. Wow. I'm so excited!
I am not sure though why the Lord of Winterfell should wear something that looks like a raccoon dog. That is one crappy fur!

I couldn't actually see the teaser from your post, George, though I could link to HBO-America and find it there. I'm in Canada; I have HBO-Canada. We get most of the US station's shows, but I don't know if we get all of them (then again, we get Canadian HBO shows like "Less Than Kind," which I doubt the US HBO audience sees). Do you know if the Game of Thrones HBO agreement is for both strands of the "network"?

I'm not actually willing to move back to the USA - country of my birth and the majority of my life thus far - just to see "Game of Thrones"; but I might get my US relatives to send it to me from their US TV sets, ya know {g}?
I'm in Canada too, and I couldn't see the trailer that Mr. Martin posted either, but when I went to the HBO US website, I was able to watch it there, and now it's loading on this Not A Blog.
Geeking out right now =D. So happy.
Wheeeeeee!!!! Just a burp of a teaser, but still...*is excited* And, damn, Sean looks GOOD....*swoons*
super exciting!
that was the saddest trailer ever!  we were waiting for something substantial and there were just a bunch of trees.  :(

they've only filmed the pilot, and a majority of that footage will likely be cut since two of the main actresses have been replaced. so i'm not sure why you're complaining. i'm shocked (and pleased!) that we got footage at all. i thought it would LITERALLY be only trees and hooves and a logo
So excite!

Totally fangirling right now ;)

LOVE the hi-res shot of Sean Bean. I get to see his amazing costume up-close and personal! One of the reasons I watch (and love) The Tudors is for the costumes... and I expect nothing less from GoT. Are those direwolves on his belt?!

Not long enough, and doesn't show enough good, juicy scenes... hence this is the perfect teaser trailer. Not that we need any more teasing than what we've had for like almost a year now.

Seriously though, I CAN HARDLY WAAAAAAIT!!!
This is the reason that I will be saving up to get a TV and cable in my new apartment.

comments.upictitle: You'll have to speak up, I'm wearing a towel: borat
comments.article: Still waiting to see what The Others look like. :)
WOOHOO!!! CAN'T WAIT!!
Poor, poor Sean Bean. He doesn't get to live in anything.

comments.upictitle: One who is insane... or... Aurora... either works: dancin
comments.article: Words do not describe the ecstasy I feel....*squeeee*
I'm really looking forward to the series, but that teaser was a huge disappointment and not even worth sharing.
as they say in DC, "that's what she said"... (we don't agree)
thank you!!
See icon for my immediate reaction upon seeing this. I CANNOT WAIT!! :D
